resources.string: To take your photos for profile and to share photos in chat/stories allow Flow to access to your camera
To save your medias to internal storage and send medias from your device allow Flow to access your media files
To get your friends list using Flow chat application allow Flow to access your contacts
To do and receive Audio/Video Calls allow Flow to access to your Microphone
To do and receive Video Calls allow Flow to access to your Camera and Microphone
